title: Here’s How to Dress From the Feet Up This Winter, No Matter How Miserable It Is Outside
text:
You always pull it together for your 9-to-5, so don’t let footwear be the factor that throws off your game. The grip on Sperry’s Saltwater Winter Luxe Duck Boot can navigate slick city streets, while the leather finish will elevate your look. Wear them with faux-leather leggings and a turtleneck worthy of Siobhan Roy on Succession. Top off the whole outfit with a C-suite-worthy vest and statement earrings, and that job is yours.

Sperry Saltwater Winter Luxe Duck Boot, $150, sperry.com. Vest, $498. Sweater, $40. Leggings, $113. Earrings, $125.
